skillTree.localised_description: Reaper is Theodore's loyal demigryph mount, a freakishly large example of its kind taken from Nuln's war-menagerie.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Bruckner serves as the Countess Emmanuelle of Nuln's headsman and personal Judicial Champion - a role that exists to meet the ancient rite of trial by combat available to the Empire's aristocracy, except after the commission of the direst of crimes.
Bruckner, is both the personification of bloody-handed justice in the city and death incarnate to the Countess' political enemies...
The Titan Headsman is content to fight and kill at his mistress's command, and has lasted over a decade in his highly paid office, making him the longest serving Champion of Nuln in living memory.

War Menagerie of Nuln - A place to hold the many dangerous and exotic beasts that would otherwise dwell in the wilderness. Like Theodore Bruckner's huge demigryph mount 'Reaper' - itself a freakishly large example of its kind.

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Terror for Demigryph Knights units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Demigryph Knights units
	(Hero's army)

Ward save: +10% for Demigryph Knights units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: I'd do anything for the Countess. Mostly though, I kill for her.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
"If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

items.colour_text: Gifted to Bruckner by the Magisterix Elspeth von Draken to protect him from the foul sorceries of the oncoming chaos hordes, this black gem possessed powers unguessed at, and served the Magisterix's own deadly schemes.\\n\\n

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

items.colour_text: Bruckner wields this mighty sword as easily as a lesser man might a rapier and a great many dissenters, renegades and the Countess political rivals have found themselves a head shorter at his hands.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Theodore Bruckner, also known as the Hound of Judgment and the Titan Headsman, serves as the Countess Emmanuelle of Nuln's headsman and personal Judicial Champion.
